attacks.name: Even Game
attacks.effect: Count the number of your opponent's Pokémon. Search your deck for up to that number of Basic Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Stadium Play
attacks.effect: If you have a Stadium card in play, remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokémon. If your opponent has a Stadium card in play, this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
